topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cf061363687232076b0900#post_54cf061363687232076b0900
There's a few versions. There's the one you see in the picture which seems to be kinda hard to come by
Then there's a bigger version but it looks like crap
Then there's a smaller version that seems to be fairly easy to find and has a snarling varient
Then there's the talking version of the smaller version that has lines from the movie
Then there's the Japanese one which kinda looks like a Miyazaki character
And the funko one that is posable, comes with a little rifle and is fuzzy as hell


I've been buying a bit of rocket merch
If you can't tell
